channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel turns himself into a snail in 'Shell Game', then in 'Blossom Goes Wild!', Blossom gets into a fight with Storm and Lily, leaves the village, and moves into the forest with Wild. (S2, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Storm misplaces her warrior spirit in 'Storm Loses her Mojo', then in 'Pop Out', Gargamel casts a spell which makes everything that Grouchy complains about appear inside his hovel. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Travelling Travis is on another great adventure in 'Pups Save an Antarctic Martian', then in 'Pups Save the Maze Explorers', Mr. Porter and Alex get trapped inside a huge maze! (S7, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Box Fort', then in 'Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill!', Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island. (S8, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Store Day: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores to earn kitty coins. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Edmond Elephant's Birthday; The Biggest Muddy Puddle In The World: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her family visit a theme park in 'Potato City', where the magic of vegetables never ends. Then in 'The New House', Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a house that Mr Bull is building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost Egg: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow. A tiny chick hatches from the egg and the children must find the mummy bird.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Games: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef struggles to perform magic tricks in 'Noodle Bowls', and then in 'Spicy Cauliflower Bites', Chef makes an extreme snack. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole in 'Pups Save Little Hairy', then in 'Pups Save a Kooky Climber', Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. (S7, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Basketball: The children are taught how to play basketball by Daddy coach. They are soon good enough to take on a bigger team.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Horsey Twinkle Toes: Mr Zebra delivers a parcel for Peppa and George from their Auntie Dottie. What could it be.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Doctor Hamster's pet, Tiddles, has got stuck up a tree, again in 'Naughty Tortoise', and then it's off to 'Mr Fox's Shop' to find a nice present for Granny and Grandpa's Anniversary.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Lucky the dog's luck might have run out in 'Paddington's Lucky Day', then in 'Paddington the Pizza Chef', Baaz's niece Simi is visiting and he wants to create the perfect pizza for her. (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy loses a tooth in 'Paddington & The Tooth Fairy', then in 'Paddington Goes to Work', Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown at home, but learns computers can be tricky. (S2, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston The Ladybird: Holly and Ben think Gaston the Ladybird is sad so they try and cheer him up by tidying his cave. But Gaston liked his cave just as it was - all messy and untidy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Farm: Holly goes with Ben and Mr Elf to the elf farm to collect an egg for the King's breakfast. While there, a huge chicken escapes from the farm and Holly and the elves have to chase it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Digger World: Mummy and Daddy Pig, Peppa and George have a wonderful day with Mr. Potato at Digger World.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Doll Hospital: When Peppa gets Teddy dirty jumping in muddy puddles, she goes to The Doll Hospital.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wendy Wolf's Birthday: Wendy Wolf's birthday is here and she has invited Peppa and friends around for a party.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London; Simple Science; When I Grow Up; The Ambulance; Doctors; Super Potato; Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When I Grow Up; The Ambulance; Doctors; Super Potato; Creepy Crawly Safari; Hoops: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson; Singing Competition; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River; Granny Sheep Moves In: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Duck Pond: When water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it's up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Shadows; International Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Rain does not stop play, it just moves it inside in 'The Rainy Day Game', and then in 'Mummy Rabbit's Bump', Mummy Rabbit comes to visit with a big tummy, and everyone is in for a surprise.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Knight Riders: While racing, Blaze and Crusher discover a medieval kingdom holding a Royal Race! The two trucks become knights to compete with other knights in the race across the realm. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Meow-Mazing Games: When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads. (S1, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Pedro Pony spends the day just like in the Wild West in 'Pedro The Cowboy', and then in 'Peppa and George's Garden', Grandpa Pig brings some seeds for Peppa and George to grow a garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's a busy day for Doctor Hamster, with lots of animals needing her help in 'The Flying Vet', and then in 'Kylie Kangaroo', Peppa and George meet Kylie Kangaroo and her brother Joey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Emmy and Eddie take a joyride in 'Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers', then in 'Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant', Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! (S10, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Wally the Walrus searches for Cap'n Turbot in 'Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus', then in 'Pups Save the Hummy Gummies', Mayor Humdinger is jealous of Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharknapped!: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend! (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups build the first hotel in town in 'The Crew Builds A Hotel', and then in 'The Crew Builds A Hiking Trail', the crew saves a duck birthday party. (S2, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature in 'The Legend of the Night Howler', then in 'The Haystack Stakeout', who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile? (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Jokey transforms Poet into Gargamel's Mom in 'Funny Mommy', then in 'Smurfy Day Care', Storm has to become a super smurfsitter when all of the Smurfs turn back into babies. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots get a baby back to its mama in 'The Little Axolotl', and in 'Bubble Trouble', Dora must save the Big Red Chicken who floats away in a bubble right before the big talent show. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Lucky comes to stay over in 'Paddington's Pet Hotel', and then in 'Paddington Plays Golf', Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says? (S2, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Captain Daddy Dog; Grampy Rabbit's Dinosaur Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Pig reads Peppa and George a story to help them fall asleep in 'Bedtime Story', and then in 'Lost Keys', Peppa and her family have been to a mountain beauty spot, when Daddy Pig loses the keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Dinosaur is replaced with a newer model in 'George's New Dinosaur', while in 'Grandpa Pig's Train To The Rescue', Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, full of passengers who need to get to work.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everyone at playgroup has brought in their pets for 'The Pet Competition', and then in 'Spider Web', Mummy Pig finds a spider in the house and orders Daddy Pig to please move it into the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Brown is talking about selling the house in 'Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens', then in 'Paddington Helps a Hedgehog', the kids are playing in the garden and make a prickly discovery. (S2, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharknapped!: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend! (S2, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret. (S2, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Pandy's Birthday: It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf wants to prove that alchemy is more powerful than magic in 'Smurfy Magic Duel', then in 'Doctor Brainy & Mister Dumb', Brainy's new invention backfires and leaves him brainless. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Leaf gets sick, causing some wild climate changes in 'Leaf's Under the Weather', then in 'House Call', Gargamel gets sick, and the Smurfs feel obliged to help him. (S2, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse in 'Pups Save the Squirrels', then in 'Pups Save a Roo', when a joey is separated from its mother, it's up to the pups to save a roo and the day! (S6, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire in 'Pups Stop a Super Shaker', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse', Farmer Al has a wild dream that his animals start acting like humans. (S8, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Rangers: Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden, and embark on a hiking adventure! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Noisy Night; Wishing Well: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle is leaving (don't worry, not really) in 'Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party', and then in 'The Queen', Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's award for industry, for all the work she does.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef turns a garden cactus into nopales in 'Nopales Tacos', then in 'Sloppy Joes', Chef tries to keep his new apron clean. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A mixed-up delivery leads to chaos in 'Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater', then in 'Pups Save Ryder's Surprise', Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped. (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Desert Island: When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them. He realises he misses the sea.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Perfume: After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The school roof has a leak again, so the children raise money for a new roof in 'Children's Fete', then in 'The Aquarium', Goldie the Goldfish is feeling lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns have unbelievable new neighbours in 'Paddington's New Neighbour', and in 'Paddington Makes the News', Paddington, Jonathan & Judy create a newspaper but need a front page story! (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr. Gruber does a good turn for Paddington in 'Paddington Shares A Good Deed', then in 'Paddington Goes Green', Paddington learns about composting, and tries to grow flowers for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.
